actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Education, Arts, Humanities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Education, Arts and Humanities

official_title: A bill to amend part F of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 regarding the computation of the expected family contribution to exclude the portion of the current market value of a family's principal place of residence or farm on which the family resides which exceeds twice the family's total income.
short_title: Homeowners Higher Education Student Assistance Relief Act of 1991

summary.text: Homeowners Higher Education Student Assistance Relief Act of 1991 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exclude, under provisions for the computation of the expected family contribution in student aid determinations, that portion of the current market value of a family's principal place of residence or a farm on which the family resides which exceeds twice the family's total income.

titles.title: Homeowners Higher Education Student Assistance Relief Act of 1991

A bill to amend part F of title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 regarding the computation of the expected family contribution to exclude the portion of the current market value of a family's principal place of residence or farm on which the family resides which exceeds twice the family's total income.
